code: export const projects=[{title:"Dynamic Road Noise Equalizer",subtitle:"Arduino, C++, 3D Printing",description:"An Arduino system with a GPS module that automatically equalize speaker volume according to vehicle speed to enhance driving safety.",image:'p1-cover.png',link:"https://github.com/anson-poon/Dynamic-Road-Noise-Equalizer"},{title:"VirtuDecor: Mixed Reality Furnishing",subtitle:"C#, Unity",description:"A Meta Quest Pro app that let users place furniture within their mixed reality environment.",image:'p2-cover.gif',link:"https://appdove.wixsite.com/club/post/winter-2023-furniture-app-showcase-springer-2023-term-plan-overview"},{title:"Small Shell",subtitle:"C, Unix",description:"A custom Bash-like Unix shell with input parsing, parameter expansion, redirections and command execution.",image:'p3-cover.gif'},{title:"Home Inventory Companion",subtitle:"Python, Tkinter, Pandas",description:"A GUI inventory app built with the needs of designers, architects, and homeowners in mind.",image:'p4-cover.png',link:"https://github.com/anson-poon/Home-Inventory-App"},{title:"GoFit: Exercise Logger",subtitle:"MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js",description:"An exercise logger built with RESTful API supporting CRUD operations.",image:'p5-cover.png',link:"https://github.com/anson-poon/MERN-Stack-Exercise-Logger"},{title:"And this portfolio site!",subtitle:"HTML, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, React",description:"",image:'p6-cover.png',link:"https://github.com/anson-poon/portfolio-website"}];export const skills=["C/C++","Python","Java","Kotlin","JavaScript","HTML/CSS","React","Node.js","Express","MongoDB","SQL","Linux/Unix","Arduino","Andriod","Figma","Git"];

sourcesContent:
export const projects = [
  {
    title: "Dynamic Road Noise Equalizer",
    subtitle: "Arduino, C++, 3D Printing",
    description:
      "An Arduino system with a GPS module that automatically equalize speaker volume according to vehicle speed to enhance driving safety.",
    image: 'p1-cover.png',
    link: "https://github.com/anson-poon/Dynamic-Road-Noise-Equalizer",
  },
  {
    title: "VirtuDecor: Mixed Reality Furnishing",
    subtitle: "C#, Unity",
    description:
      "A Meta Quest Pro app that let users place furniture within their mixed reality environment.",
    image: 'p2-cover.gif',
    link: "https://appdove.wixsite.com/club/post/winter-2023-furniture-app-showcase-springer-2023-term-plan-overview",
  },
  {
    title: "Small Shell",
    subtitle: "C, Unix",
    description:
      "A custom Bash-like Unix shell with input parsing, parameter expansion, redirections and command execution.",
    image: 'p3-cover.gif',
  },
  {
    title: "Home Inventory Companion",
    subtitle: "Python, Tkinter, Pandas",
    description:
      "A GUI inventory app built with the needs of designers, architects, and homeowners in mind.",
    image: 'p4-cover.png',
    link: "https://github.com/anson-poon/Home-Inventory-App",
  },
  {
    title: "GoFit: Exercise Logger",
    subtitle: "MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js",
    description:
      "An exercise logger built with RESTful API supporting CRUD operations.",
    image: 'p5-cover.png',
    link: "https://github.com/anson-poon/MERN-Stack-Exercise-Logger",
  },
  {
    title: "And this portfolio site!",
    subtitle: "HTML, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, React",
    description:
      "",
    image: 'p6-cover.png',
    link: "https://github.com/anson-poon/portfolio-website"
  },
];


export const skills = [
  "C/C++",
  "Python",
  "Java",
  "Kotlin",
  "JavaScript",
  "HTML/CSS",
  "React",
  "Node.js",
  "Express",
  "MongoDB",
  "SQL",
  "Linux/Unix",
  "Arduino",
  "Andriod",
  "Figma",
  "Git"
];
